SETTINGS.MODULE: RedirectURL.py ON without this feature the script cannot check the redirection URL.
pdf2url.py ON without this feature the script cannot conver a pdf to HTML and cannot extract the URL from a PDF file.
selenium_simulator.py ON without this feature the script cannot simulate as a browser to open an URL or a HTML file.
Submit_FILE_Virustotal.py ON without this feature the script cannot submit the files to Virustotal.
MineMeld_Indicator.ps1 ON without this feature the script cannot call the MineMeld API to add the IOCs into the Indicator List.
ESA_Spam_Block.ps1 ON without this feature the script cannot call the Cisco ESA's API to add the spam email address into the spam quarantine blocklist.
secureX.ps1 ON without this feature the script cannot call the Cisco SecureX API and Microsoft 365 Defender API to get the related email information and the end user's activities.
